content:
Here is an article outlining the full process that the VA supports today for patient medical records correction.
https://www.ptsdexams.net/correct-va-medical-records.html
Thank you! This is highly relevant to a project I'm working on this week.
I have been told that there is an online method now available, but have not yet been given the details. This online method was quickly built because of the covid-19 restrictions.

Thanks for this, @John Moehrke. The 10 steps are mostly meta ("find a printer") rather than the correction itself, but I do like this sample letter - "4-5 beers a MONTH, not per WEEK" :-)
image.png
that was 2020 fact, and the correction is my plan for 2021
